<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.25
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>ex10-25.htm
<DESCRIPTION>SALE AND RETENTION BONUS AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE> </TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#ffffff" style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>



<DIV style="font-size:11pt">

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><B>Exhibit 10.25</B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><u><b>Execution Copy</b></u></p>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><b><font size=4>Pathmark Stores, Inc.</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>February 1, 2000</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>Marc Strassler</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>c/o Pathmark Stores, Inc.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>200 Milik Street</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>Carteret, New Jersey 07008</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u>Sale and Retention Bonus Agreement</u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>Dear Marc:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>The following sets forth the agreement between you
and Pathmark Stores, Inc., a corporation organized under the laws of Delaware (the <i>&#147;Company&#148;</i>), regarding the terms
of the sale bonus (the <i>&#147;Sale Bonus&#148;</i>) and the retention bonus (the <i>&#147;Retention Bonus&#148;</i>) that you may
be eligible to receive in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth below. This letter agreement (the <i>&#147;Letter
Agreement&#148;</i>) is in addition to, and not in substitution for, any other agreements between or among you and the Company Group
(as defined below), including without limitation the employment agreement between you and the Company, dated February 1, 1999 (the
<i>&#147;Employment Agreement&#148;</i>), and the Retention Bonus and the Sale Bonus are in addition to, and not in substitution
for, any other pay or benefits to which you are eligible to earn from the Company Group.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Definitions</u>. For purposes of this Letter Agreement, the following capitalized words that are not otherwise defined in the text of the Letter Agreement shall have the meanings set forth below:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Aggregate Consideration&#148; </i>shall mean an amount equal to the sum of the aggregate fair market value of any securities issued and any other non-cash consideration delivered, and any cash consideration paid to the Company Group or its security holders in connection with a Change in Control, plus the amount of all indebtedness of the Company Group which is assumed or acquired by any Purchaser in connection with a Change in Control or retired or defeased in connection with such Change in Control. The fair market value of any securities issued and any other non-cash consideration delivered in connection with a Change in Control will be the value determined in good faith by the Board.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Beneficial Owner&#148; </i>shall have the meaning given to such term in Rule 13D-3 under the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Board&#148; </i>shall mean the Board of Directors of Holdings.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Change in Control&#148; </i>shall mean the consummation of a Triggering Event.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Company&#148; </i>shall mean Pathmark Stores, Inc.</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>
<i>&#147;Company Group&#148; </i>shall mean, individually and as a group, Holdings, the Company, PTK Holdings, Inc. and Supermarkets General Holdings Corporation, and any successors thereto.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Effective Date&#148; </i>shall mean February 1, 2000.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Holdings&#148; </i>shall mean SMG-II Holdings Corporation, a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Independent Third Party&#148; </i>shall mean any entity other than a member of the Company Group or any of the Stockholders or any entity controlled by or under common control with any of the Stockholders or the Company Group.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Payment Date&#148; </i>shall mean July 31, 2000.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Purchaser&#148; </i>shall mean any Independent Third Party that engages in a Change in Control.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>&#147;Sellers&#148; </i>shall mean selling equity holders, which holders may be at the level of any of the Company Group.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>A <i>&#147;Triggering
Event&#148; </i>shall be deemed to have occurred on the date that any of he following shall have occurred:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;
text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any member of the Company Group enters
into a binding agreement with one or more Independent Third Parties to directly acquire, in exchange for cash, stock, claims, or
property, fifty percent or more of the aggregate equity securities of Holdings for which the MLCP Investors and the Equitable
Investors (as defined in the Amended and Restated Stockholders Agreement among Holdings and its Stockholders, dated January 22,
1998) (together, the <i>&#147;Stockholders&#148;</i>) are Beneficial Owners as of the Effective Date;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any member of the Company Group enters into a binding agreement providing for a merger, consolidation, reorganization or other business combination upon consummation of which one or more Independent Third Parties would own or control fifty percent or more of either (i) the aggregate voting securities of the Company Group, (ii) the aggregate economic interest of the outstanding equity securities of the Company Group or (iii) the aggregate value of the assets of the Company;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(C)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any member of the Company Group enters into transaction upon consummation of which an Independent Third Party would acquire in exchange for cash, stock, claims or property fifty percent or more of either (I) the aggregate equity securities of the Company, PTK Holdings, Inc. or Supermarkets General Holdings Corporation, or (II) the Company&#146;s assets; or</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(D)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any member of the Company Group files a plan of reorganization or motion for relief in a case under title 11 of the United States Code for the purpose of implementing an agreement or transaction of the type described in any of the preceding clauses (A), (B) or (C);</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>2</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:left;'>
<i>provided, however, </i>that a Triggering Event shall not include any change of ownership resulting from a public offering of any of the securities of any of the Company Group pursuant to an effective registration statement under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Term</u>. The term of this Letter Agreement (the <i>&#147;Term&#148;) </i>shall commence on the Effective Date and shall continue until the later of (a) first anniversary of the Effective Date if a Triggering Event does not occur prior to such anniversary or (b) in the event that a Triggering Event occurs prior to the first anniversary of the Effective Date, either the date of a Change in Control that occurs subsequent to a corresponding Triggering Event or the date the Triggering Event is definitively canceled or otherwise becomes void.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="274" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top >
            <p  style='text-indent:0in'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>3.</p> </td>
        <td width="130" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u>Retention Bonus</u>.</p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1.01in;text-align:left;'>In consideration of, and subject to, your continued employment with the Company during the period beginning on the Effective Date and ending on the Payment Date, the Company will pay you a Retention Bonus equal to the annual rate of your base salary, as in effect on the Payment Date multiplied by 0.75.<i> </i>The Company will pay the Retention Bonus to you in a lump sum cash amount as soon as practicable after the Payment Date but in no event more than thirty days thereafter.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="239" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top >
            <p  style='text-indent:0in'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>4.</p> </td>
        <td width="95" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u>Sale Bonus</u>.</p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>General Terms</u>. You will become entitled to receive the Sale Bonus in the event that (I) a Triggering Event occurs during the Term, and (ii) a Change in Control contemplated by such Triggering Event occurs thereafter. The amount of the Sale Bonus shall be equal to 0.0010 multiplied by the Aggregate Consideration.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;
text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Payment of Sales Bonus</u>. (I)
<u>Change in Control&#151;No Post-Closing Adjustment</u>. In the event that the transaction resulting in a Change in Control does
not include any provisions either (A) for an earn-out with respect to which a part of the Aggregate Consideration will be paid to
the Sellers either in full or in part in one or more installments after the Change in Control or any similar deferral of the payment
of the Aggregate Consideration or (B) that would potentially require the Sellers to reimburse any portion of the Sale Price to the
purchaser or require the purchaser to pay to the Sellers any amount in addition to the Aggregate Consideration, as a result of a
post-closing adjustment or any other reason, after the Change in Control (either (A) or (B), a <i>&#147;Post-Closing
Adjustment&#148;</i>), the Company shall pay to you the Sale Bonus within five days following the date of such Change in Control;
<i>provided, however, </i>that in no event shall the Sale Bonus be payable to you until the full amount of the Aggregate
Consideration has been paid to the Sellers.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Change in Control&#151;Post-Closing Adjustment</u>. In the event that the Change in Control transaction includes provisions for any Post-Closing Adjustment, the Company shall pay the Sale Bonus according to the terms of this Section 4(b)(ii).</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that the Change in Control transaction includes a Post-Closing Adjustment described in Section 4(b)(I)(A) above, the Company shall pay you a portion of the Sale Bonus within five days after the date of such Change in Control equal to 0.0010 multiplied by the portion of the Aggregate Consideration paid to the Sellers on or about the date of the Change in Control. Thereafter, within five days after any additional portion of the Aggregate</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>3</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:left;'>
Consideration is paid to the Sellers, the Company shall pay you a portion of the Aggregate Consideration multiplied by 0.0010.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;
text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that the Change in Control
transaction is a Post-Closing Adjustment described in Section 4(b)(I)(B) that would potentially require the Sellers to reimburse any
portion of the Aggregate Consideration to the purchaser after the Change in Control, within five days after the date of such Change
in Control, the Company shall pay you a portion of the Sale Bonus determined in good faith by the Board immediately prior to the
consummation of the Change in Control, less an amount that shall take into account the potential adjustment to the Sales Price (the
<i>&#147;Withheld Amount&#148;</i>). As soon as practicable after the Sellers know with certainty the portion, if any, of the Sale
Price that the Sellers must reimburse to the purchaser and the Sellers make such reimbursement, if any, the Company shall pay to you
a prorated portion of the Withheld Amount corresponding to the portion of the maximum potential amount that Sellers may have been
required to reimburse to the purchaser less the amount actually reimbursed.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(C)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that the Change in Control transaction is a Post-Closing Adjustment described in Section 4(b)(I)(B) that would potentially require the purchaser to pay to the Sellers any amount in addition to the Sale Price after the Change in Control, within five days after the date of such Change in Control, the Company shall pay you the Sale Bonus. Thereafter, within five days after the purchaser knows with certainty the additional amount that such purchaser must pay to the Sellers, if any, and the purchaser makes such payment to the Sellers, the Company shall pay to you an additional amount determined in good faith by the Board that shall take into account the additional payment made by the purchaser to the Sellers.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Determination of the Board Final</u>. The determination of whether a Triggering Event or Change in Control has occurred, the amount of the Aggregate Consideration and the amount of any Sale Bonus shall be made in good faith by the Board (unless otherwise required by applicable law) and, absent manifest error, shall be final and binding on you, the Company Group and all other interested parties.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Single Sales Bonus</u>. The parties hereto acknowledge and agree that you shall be entitled to receive only one Sale Bonus under this Letter Agreement which shall become payable in connection with the first Triggering Event that occurs during the Term and that in the event any additional Triggering Event occurs during the Term, you will not be entitled to any Sale Bonus as a consequence thereof.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="411" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top >
            <p  style='text-indent:0in'>&nbsp;<i></i></p> </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><i>5.</i></p> </td>
        <td width="267" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u>Effect of Termination of Employment</u>.<i></i></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Involuntary Termination</u>. In the event of your Involuntary Termination (as defined in the Employment Agreement) prior to the Payment Date, you shall be entitled to receive the Retention Bonus in accordance with the terms of Section 3, as if your employment had continued until such Payment Date. In the event of your Involuntary Termination on or after August 1, 2000 and prior to a Triggering Event, you shall remain entitled to receive the Sale Bonus in the event of a subsequent Triggering Event and a corresponding Change in Control in the same manner as if your employment with the Company had continued through the end of the Term.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>4</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>
(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Other Termination</u>. In the event that your employment terminates for any reason other than an Involuntary Termination prior to the Payment Date, you shall forfeit your right to the Retention Bonus in its entirety. Similarly, in the event that your employment terminates for any reason other than an Involuntary Termination at any time during the Term, you shall forfeit any right you may have to receive the Sale Bonus.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Notice</u>. For the purpose of this Letter Agreement, notices and all other communications provided for in this Letter Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been duly given when delivered by hand, sent by telecopier or mailed by United States registered mail, return receipt requested, postage prepaid, addressed to the Chief Executive Officer, Pathmark Stores, Inc., 200 Milik Street, Carteret, New Jersey 07008, telecopier: (732) 499-3460, with a copy to the General Counsel of the Company, or to you at the address set forth on the first page of this Letter Agreement or to such other address as either party may have furnished to the other in writing in accordance herewith, except that notice of change of address shall be effective only upon receipt.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;
text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Reduction of Payments
if Reduction Would Result in Greater After-Tax Amount</u>. Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, if the payment of the
Retention Bonus or the Sale Bonus (together, the <i>&#147;Payments&#148;</i>) constitute a <i>&#147;parachute payment&#148; </i>(as
defined in Section 280G(b)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the <i>&#147;Code&#148;</i>)), and the net after-tax
amount of the parachute payment is less than the net after-tax amount if the aggregate Payments to be made to you were three times
your <i>&#147;base amount&#148; </i>(as defined in Section 280G(b)(3) of the Code), less $1.00, then the aggregate of the amounts of
the Sale Bonus and/or Retention Bonus constituting the parachute payment shall be reduced to an amount that will equal three times
your base amount, less $1.00.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="259" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top >
            <p  style='text-indent:0in'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>8.</p> </td>
        <td width="286" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u>Miscellaneous</u>.</p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>No Rights to Continued Employment</u>. Neither this Letter Agreement nor any of the rights or benefits evidenced hereby shall confer upon you any right to continuance of employment by the Company or interfere in any way with the right of the Company to terminate your employment, subject to the provisions of Section <i>5 </i>above, for any reason, with or without Cause.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Amendments, Waivers</u>. No provision of this Letter Agreement may be modified, waived or discharged unless such waiver, modification or discharge is agreed to in writing by the parties hereto. No waiver by either party hereto at any time of any breach by the other party hereto of, or compliance with, any condition or provision of this Letter Agreement to be performed by such other party shall be deemed a waiver of similar or dissimilar provisions or conditions at the same or at any prior or subsequent time.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Counterparts</u>. This Letter Agreement may be executed in counterparts, each of which shall be deemed to be an original but all of which together will constitute one and the same instrument.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Withholding</u>. Amounts paid to you hereunder shall be subject to all applicable federal, state and local wage withholdings.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>5</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>
(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Headings</u>. The headings contained in this Letter Agreement are intended solely for convenience of reference and shall not affect the rights of the parties to this Letter Agreement.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Stockholder Approval</u>. This Letter Agreement shall become effective only if it is approved by a majority of seventy-five percent of the stockholders of Holdings, Supermarkets General Holdings Corporation, PTK Holdings, Inc. and the Company within one-hundred and eighty days after date first shown above. In the event that such stockholders do not approve this Agreement on or before the one-hundred and eightieth day after the date of this Letter Agreement, it shall automatically lapse and become void.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Governing Law</u>. The validity, interpretation, construction and performance of this Letter Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of New Jersey applicable to contracts entered into and performed in such state.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1.01in;text-align:left;'>If this Letter Agreement sets forth our agreement on the subject matter hereof, kindly sign and return to the Company the enclosed copy of this letter, which will then constitute our agreement on this subject.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

    <tr>
        <td width="391" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="391" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td  colspan="3" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="391" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="29" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>By</p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top style=' border-bottom:solid black .5pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>/s/ James L. Donald</p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="391" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="29" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="55" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>Name:</p> </td>
        <td width="160" valign=top style='border-top:solid black .5pt; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>JAMES L. DONALD</p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="391" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="29" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="55" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>Title: </p> </td>
        <td width="160" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>President</p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>Agreed to as of this 4th day of Feb., 2000.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="186" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="186" valign=top style='border-bottom:solid black .5pt; padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>/s/ Marc Strassler</p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="186" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p align=center  style='line-height:normal'>Marc Strassler</p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>6</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<TYPE>EX-10.26

<FILENAME>ex10-26.htm
<DESCRIPTION>SIDE LETTER
<TEXT>

<TITLE> </TITLE>

<BODY bgcolor="#ffffff" style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>


<DIV style="font-size:11pt">

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><b>Exhibit 10.26</b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><U><B>EXECUTION COPY</B></U></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><b><font size=4>Pathmark Stores, Inc.</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>July 1, 2000</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>Marc Strassler</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>c/o Pathmark Stores, Inc.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>200 Milik Street</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>Carteret, New Jersey 07008</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>Side Letter to the Sale and Retention Bonus Agreement,</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u>The Employment Agreement and Certain Additional Understandings</u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>Dear Marc:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>This side letter (the <b>&#147;</b><i><b>Letter</b></i>&#148;) sets forth the agreement between you and Pathmark Stores, Inc., a corporation organized under the laws of Delaware (the &#147;<i><b>Company</b></i>&#148;), regarding the amendment to the terms of the Sale and Retention Bonus Agreement between you and the Company dated February 1, 2000 (the &#147;<i><b>Bonus Agreement</b></i>&#148;) and to the terms of the employment agreement between you and the Company, dated February 1, 1999 (the &#147;<i><b>Employment Agreement</b></i>&#148;). In addition, this Letter includes an acknowledgement of certain occurrences in connection with the terms of the Employment Agreement. This Letter shall be effective as of the
date first set forth above.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='font-size:11pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><B>A.</B></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='font-size:11pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><b>Amendments to the Bonus Agreement</b></u><b>.</b></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>New Definitions</u>. (a) The following definition is hereby added to Section 1 of the Bonus Agreement immediately prior to the definition of &#147;<i><b>Payment Date</b></i>&#148;:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>&#147;<i><b>Liquidation Date</b></i>&#148; shall mean January 31, 2001.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(b) The following definition is hereby added to Section 1 of the Bonus Agreement immediately prior to the definition of &#147;<i><b>Purchaser</b></i>&#148;:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>&#147;<i><b>Plan Effective Date</b></i>&#148; shall mean the effective date of the judicial consent to the Joint Prepackaged Chapter 11 Plan of Reorganization of the Company, its parent companies and subsidiaries.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The following definition is hereby added to Section 1 of the Bonus Agreement immediately prior to the definition of &#147;<i><b>Triggering Event</b></i>&#148;:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>&#147;<i><b>Stock Option</b></i>&#148; shall mean any vested or unvested outstanding stock option awarded under any equity compensation plan of the Company or its subsidiaries that is exercisable upon vesting for shares of common stock of the Company or any of its subsidiaries.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Modified Definition</u>. The definition of &#147;<i><b>Triggering Event</b></i>&#148; in Section 1 of the Bonus Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced by the following:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>Prior to the Plan Effective Date, a &#147;<i><b>Triggering Event</b></i>&#148; shall be deemed to have occurred on the date that any of he following shall have occurred:</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any member of the Company Group enters into a binding agreement with one or more Independent Third Parties to directly acquire, in exchange for cash, stock, claims, or property, fifty percent or more of the aggregate equity securities of Holdings for which the MLCP Investors and the Equitable Investors (as defined in the Amended and Restated Stockholders Agreement among Holdings and its Stockholders, dated January 22, 1998) (together, the &#147;<i>Stockholders</i>&#148;) are Beneficial Owners as of the Effective Date;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any member of the Company Group enters into a binding agreement providing for a merger, consolidation, reorganization or other business combination upon consummation of which one or more Independent Third Parties would own or control fifty percent or more of either (i) the aggregate voting securities of the Company Group, (ii) the aggregate economic interest of the outstanding equity securities of the Company Group or (iii) the aggregate value of the assets of the Company;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(C)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any member of the Company Group enters into transaction upon consummation of which an Independent Third Party would acquire in exchange for cash, stock, claims or property fifty percent or more of either (I) the aggregate equity securities of the Company, PTK Holdings, Inc. or Supermarkets General Holdings Corporation, or (II) the Company&#146;s assets; or</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(D)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any member of the Company Group files a plan of reorganization or motion for relief in a case under title 11 of the United States Code for the purpose of implementing an agreement or transaction of the type
described in any of the preceding clauses (A), (B) or (C);</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:left;'><i>provided, however,<b>
</b></i>that a Triggering Event shall not include any change of ownership resulting from a public offering of any of the securities
of any of the Company Group pursuant to an effective registration statement under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>On and after the Plan Effective Date, a &#147;<i><b>Triggering Event</b></i>&#148; shall be deemed to have occurred on the date that any of the following shall have occurred, <i>provided<b> </b></i>that a Triggering Event may occur only during the Term (as defined in Section 2 below):</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the acquisition by any Person of beneficial ownership (within the meaning of Rule 13d-3 promulgated under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended) of 35%<i><b> </b></i>or more of the common stock of the Company (the &#147;<i><b>Common Stock</b></i>&#148;) then outstanding, and the individuals who, as of the Plan Effective Date, constitute the Board and subsequently elected members of the Board whose election is approved or recommended by at least a majority of such current members or their successors whose election was so approved or recommended (other than any subsequently elected members whose initial assumption of office occurs as a result of an actual or threatened election contest with respect to the election or removal
of directors or other actual or threatened solicitation of proxies or consents by or on behalf of a Person other than the Board) cease for any reason to constitute at least a majority of such Board; <i>provided, however<b>, </b></i>that in no event shall a Triggering Event be deemed to have occurred upon any such acquisition by (i) any employee benefit plan of the Company, (ii) any Person or entity organized, appointed or established by the Company for or pursuant to the terms of any such employee benefit plan, or (iii) any Person (other than any of Fidelity Management &amp; Research Company or Fidelity Management Trust Company or by any fund or account associated with either Fidelity Management &amp; Research Company or Fidelity Management Trust Company) who as of the Plan Effective Date was the beneficial owner of 15% or more of the shares of Common Stock outstanding on such date unless and until such Person, together with
all Affiliates of such Person, becomes the beneficial owner of 35% or more of the shares of Common Stock then outstanding whereupon a Change in Control shall be deemed to have occurred;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Company enters into a binding agreement with one or more Persons to directly acquire, in exchange for cash, stock, claims or property, 50%<i><b> </b></i>or more of the aggregate equity securities of the Company; or</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(C)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Company enters into a binding agreement providing for a merger, consolidation, reorganization or other business combination upon consummation of which one or more Persons would own or control 50% or more of either (i) the aggregate voting securities of the Company, or (ii) the aggregate value of the assets of the Company.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>2</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>
</p>


<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>For purposes of the above definition of Triggering Event only, the following defined terms shall apply:</p>
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>&#147;<i><b>Affiliate</b></i>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any other entity which (i) is a Subsidiary of such Person, (ii) is, directly or indirectly, under common control with such Person, or (iii) is, directly or indirectly, controlling such Person.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;
text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>&#147;<i><b>Person</b></i>&#148; means any person, entity or &#147;group&#148; within the
meaning of Section 13(d)(3) or Section 14(d)(2) of the Exchange Act, except that such term shall not include (i) the Company or any
of its subsidiaries, (ii) a trustee or other fiduciary holding securities under an employee benefit plan of the Company or any
of its subsidiaries, (iii) an underwriter temporarily holding securities pursuant to an offering of such securities, or (iv) an
entity owned, directly or indirectly, by the shareholders of Pathmark in substantially the same proportions as their ownership of
stock of the Company.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>&#147;<i><b>Subsidiary</b></i>&#148; means with respect to any Person, any entity of which:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if a corporation, a majority of the total voting power of shares of stock entitled (without regard to the occurrence of any contingency) to vote in the election of directors, managers or trustees thereof is at the time of determination owned or controlled, directly or indirectly, collectively or individually, by such Person or by one or more Affiliates of such Person, and</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if a partnership, association, limited liability company or other entity, a majority of the partnership, membership or other similar ownership interest thereof is at the time of determination owned or controlled, directly or indirectly, collectively or individually, by such Person or by one or more Affiliates of such Person.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Term</u>. Section of the Bonus Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced by the following:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:left;'>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Term</u>. The term of this Letter Agreement (the &#147;<i><b>Term</b></i>&#148;) shall commence on the Effective Date and shall continue until the second anniversary of the Plan Effective Date.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.46in; text-indent:0.55in;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Retention Bonus</u>. Section 3 of the Bonus Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced by the following:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="258" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="97" nowrap valign=top >
            <p  style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;line-height:11.3pt; '>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='font-size=10pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:101.52%'>3.</p> </td>
        <td width="113" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='font-size=10pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:101.52%'><u>Retention Bonus</u>.</p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;
text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Prior to a Triggering
Event</u>. In consideration of, and subject to, your continued employment with the Company prior to a Triggering Event and during
the period beginning on the Effective Date and ending on the Liquidation Date, the Company will pay you a Retention Bonus equal to
the annual rate of your base salary, as in effect on the Payment Date. The Retention Bonus will be paid in two substantially equal
installments on each of the Payment Date and the Liquidation Date, subject to your continued employment with the Company on each
such date. The Company will pay the Retention Bonus to you in lump sum cash amounts as soon as practicable after the Payment
Date and the Liquidation Date but in no event more than thirty days thereafter, respectively.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Upon a Triggering Event</u>. Upon the occurrence of a Triggering Event, the Retention Bonus shall become immediately payable in full. For purposes of calculating the amount of the Retention Bonus the date of the Triggering Event shall be considered the Payment Date. The Retention Bonus will be paid in a lump sum cash amount as soon as practicable after the date of the Triggering Event.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 4(a) of the Bonus Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced by the following:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>General Terms</u>. You will become entitled to receive the Sale Bonus in the event that (i) a Triggering Event occurs on or before the end of the Term and (ii) a Change in Control contemplated by such Triggering Event occurs thereafter. The amount of the Sale Bonus shall be equal to 0.0010 multiplied by the Aggregate Consideration; <i>provided, however,<b> </b></i>that the Sale Bonus shall be reduced by the net value you receive in connection with your Stock Options, if any, that are redeemed for cash or exchanged for other securities at the time of or prior to a Change in Control.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>3</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>
</p>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 5 of the Bonus Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced by the following:</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="370" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top >
            <p  style='text-indent:0in'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='font-size=10pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>5.</p> </td>
        <td width="226" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='font-size=10pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u>Effect of Termination of Employment</u>.</p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Involuntary Termination</u>. In the event of your Involuntary Termination (as defined in the Employment Agreement) prior to the Liquidation Date, you shall be entitled to receive the Retention Bonus in accordance with the terms of Section 3, as if your employment had continued until such Liquidation Date. In the event of your Involuntary Termination on or after August 1, 2000 and prior to a Triggering Event, you shall remain entitled to receive the Sale Bonus in the event of a subsequent Triggering Event and a corresponding Change in Control in the same manner as if your employment with the Company had continued through the end of the Term.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Other Termination</u>. In the event that your employment terminates for any reason other than an Involuntary Termination prior to the Payment Date, you shall forfeit your right to the Retention Bonus in its entirety. In the event that your employment terminates for any reason other than an Involuntary Termination after the Payment Date but prior to the Liquidation Date, you shall forfeit your right to any unpaid portion of the Retention Bonus. Similarly, in the event that your employment terminates for any reason other than an Involuntary Termination at any time during the Term, you shall forfeit any right you may have to receive the Sale Bonus.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='font-size:11pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><B>B.</B></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='font-size:11pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><b>Acknowledgement; Amendment to the Employment Agreement</b></u>.</p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Acknowledgement of a Sale of the Company</u>. You and the Company hereby acknowledge and agree that, prior to the date of this Letter, a &#147;<i><b>Sale of the Company</b></i>&#148;<i><b> </b></i>(within the meaning of Section 4(d) of the Employment Agreement) has occurred by virtue of the execution of the merger agreement dated March 9, 1999 among two of the Company&#146;s parent companies and Royal Ahold N.V., and that any Involuntary Termination (as such term is defined in the Employment Agreement) will be governed by the terms of Section 5(a)(iii) of the Employment Agreement.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Amendment of &#147;<i><b>Good Reason</b></i>&#148;</u>. The definition of &#147;<i><b>Good Reason</b></i>&#148; as set forth in Section 5(g)(iii) of the Employment Agreement is hereby amended to add the following subsection (E) immediately after subsection (D):</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style='font-size=10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>or (E) a material, adverse reduction or diminution in your title, duties, positions or responsibilities with the Company.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='font-size:11pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><B>C. </B></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='font-size:11pt;margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><b>Forgiveness of Indebtedness</b></u><b>.</b></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Description of the Debt</u>. You and the Company acknowledge and agree that immediately prior to the date of this Letter, you owed the a parent of the Company, Supermarkets General Holdings Corporation (&#147;<i><b>Holdings</b></i>&#148;), $28,000 with respect to a loan made to you by Holdings on March 15, 1990 (the &#147;<i><b>Loan Amount</b></i>&#148;).</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Forgiveness of Debt</u>. In consideration of, among other things, your agreement to the amendments set forth above with respect to the Retention Bonus and the Sale Bonus, as of the date of your termination of employment with the Company, its parents, subsidiaries and affiliates, without any further action on your part or on the part of the Company, the Company, as successor to the lending entity, shall automatically forgive the Loan Amount in full and all interest and other accrued amounts</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'>4</p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>
associated with the Loan Amount and the loan corresponding to such Loan Amount.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>&nbsp;</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>If this Letter sets forth our agreement on the subject matter hereof, kindly sign and return to the Company the enclosed copy of this Letter, which will then constitute our agreement on this subject.</p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'>&nbsp;</p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="635" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="391" valign=top >
            <p  style='line-height:normal'>&nbsp;</p> </td>
        <td  colspan="3" valign=top >
            <p  style='line-height:normal'>Sincerely,</p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="391" valign=top >
            <p  style='line-height:normal'>&nbsp;</p> </td>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'>JAMES L. DONALD</p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
