            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Pension Plan Benefit</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the annual retirement benefit payable to or on account of the Executive pursuant to the Pathmark Stores, Inc. Pension Plan.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.15</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>SGC Profit Sharing Plan</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the SGC Profit Sharing Plan as in effect immediately prior to April 1, 1983.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.16</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Supplemental Retirement Benefit</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Executive&#146;s benefit under this Agreement.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Vesting of Supplemental Retirement Benefit</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>The Executive shall become vested in his Supplemental Retirement Benefit upon the earliest to occur of:  (i) completion of 5 years of Vesting Service following January 1, 2004; (ii) death; (iii) Disability; or (iv) a Change of Control (the &#147;Vesting Date&#148;).  Notwithstanding any provision herein to the contrary, neither Executive nor his Beneficiary shall be entitled to receive any benefits hereunder if Executive&#146;s Termination of Employment with the Company (including by Retirement) occurs prior to hisVesting Date.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>3.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Amount of Supplemental Retirement Benefit; Termination Of Employment After Age 60</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>Except as provided in Sections 4 and 5 of this Agreement, the annual amount of the Executive&#146;s Supplemental Retirement Benefit shall be equal to the excess, if any, of the amount of the Executive&#146;s &#147;Unreduced Supplemental Retirement Benefit&#148; as described in subparagraph (a) over the Executive&#146;s &#147;Other Company Plan Benefits&#148; as described in subparagraph (b), where</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>a.</font><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font size=2>&#147;Unreduced Supplemental Retirement Benefit&#148; is equal to the sum of 30% of the Executive&#146;s Average Final Compensation after completion of 10 years of Vesting Service, plus 1% of the Executive&#146;s Average Final Compensation multiplied by each additional year of Vesting Service in excess of 10; provided, however, that in no event shall the Executive&#146;s Unreduced Supplemental Retirement Benefit exceed the lesser of (i) 40% of his Average Final Compensation, or (ii) $250,000; and</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>b.</font><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font size=2>&#147;Other Company Plan Benefits&#148; are the amounts payable under the Pathmark Stores, Inc. Pension Plan, the SGC Profit Sharing Plan, the Company&#146;s Excess Benefit Plan and the Company&#146;s disability income plan (other than (i) amounts payable under group life insurance, Retirement and Survivor&#146;s Insurance under the Federal Social Security Act, Worker&#146;s Compensation and other Company plans required by any governmental authority, (ii) amounts payable under the Pathmark Stores, Inc. Savings Plan to the extent attributed to amounts paid or contributed by the Company or any predecessor thereto, and (iii) any amounts payable after termination of employment as retirement, death or disability benefits (other than severance benefits) under a contract between the
Company and the Executive).</font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-left:8.33%; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>If the Executive has a Beneficiary on the date Supplemental Retirement Benefits commence under this Agreement, Other Company Plan Benefits shall be determined, on a joint and two-thirds survivor annuity basis, except as otherwise provided in this Agreement, as of such date, with the Executive&#146;s Beneficiary as joint annuitant.  The adjustment to the amount otherwise payable under the applicable Company plan for the applicable joint survivor annuity form of payment shall be made on the basis of the factors specified in such Company plan or, if no such factors are set forth in such Company plan, on an Actuarial Equivalent basis.  If the Executive does not have a Beneficiary on the date Supplemental Retirement Benefits are to commence under this Agreement, Other Company Plan Benefits shall be determined on a single life annuity basis.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:12pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>The Executive&#146;s Supplemental Retirement Benefit under this Section 3, if vested, shall be payable monthly for life commencing on the first day of the month following the Executive&#146;s termination of employment after attainment of age 60.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>4.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Termination of Employment Prior to Age 60</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>In the case of the Executive&#146;s termination of employment with the Company prior to attaining age 60 (other than by reason of the Executive&#146;s death or Disability) but after completing 10 years of Vesting Service, the amount of the Executive&#146;s Supplemental Retirement Benefit shall be equal to the Executive&#146;s Unreduced Supplemental Retirement Benefit (computed on the basis of the Vesting Service which the Executive would have completed had the Executive remained in the employ of the Company until attainment of age 60), multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is the number of the Executive&#146;s years of Vesting Service at termination of employment (up to a maximum of 20) and the denominator of which is the number of years of Vesting Service (up to a maximum of 20) which the Executive would have completed had the Executive remained in the employ of the Company
until attainment of age 60, offset by the amount of the Executive&#146;s Other Company Plan Benefits; provided that Other Company Plan Benefits shall be assumed to commence on the first day of the month after the Executive&#146;s attainment of age 60 and to be paid in the form of a joint and two-thirds survivor annuity unless Executive does not have a Beneficiary in which case benefits shall be assumed paid in the form of a life annuity.  The Executive&#146;s Supplemental Retirement Benefit under this Section 4, if vested, shall be payable monthly for life commencing on the first day of the month following the Executive&#146;s attainment of age 60.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>5.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Disability Retirement</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>In the case of the Executive&#146;s Disability Retirement, the amount of the Executive&#146;s Supplemental Retirement Benefit shall be the amount determined under Section 3 of this Agreement; provided, however, that the Executive&#146;s Unreduced Supplemental Retirement Benefit shall be computed on the basis of the Vesting Service which the Executive would have completed had the Executive remained in the employ of the Company until attainment of age 60, and the Executive&#146;s Unreduced Supplemental Retirement Benefit shall not be offset by Other Company Plan Benefits prior to the date on which payment of such Other Company Plan Benefits commence.  The Executive&#146;s </font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>Supplemental Retirement Benefit under this Section 5, if vested, shall be payable monthly for life commencing on the first day of the month following the Executive&#146;s Disability Retirement.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>6.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Death Prior to Retirement</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>a.</font><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font size=2>In the event that the Executive dies while in the employ of the Company after his Supplemental Retirement Benefit has vested and has a Beneficiary on the date of his death, the Executive&#146;s Beneficiary shall receive, beginning with the first day of the month following the Executive&#146;s death and payable monthly, an annual amount equal to two-thirds of the Executive&#146;s Unreduced Supplemental Retirement Benefit (computed on the basis of the Vesting Service which the Executive would have completed had the Executive remained in the employ of the Company until attainment of age 60) offset by the Other Company Plan Benefits; provided, however, that such offset shall be made at such time as Other Company Plan Benefits are payable (whether or not the Beneficiary has elected
to defer payment to a later date) and in an amount equal to (i) a life annuity payable to the Executive&#146;s Beneficiary that is equal to the Actuarial Equivalent of the SGC Profit Sharing Plan balance, and (ii) the survivor annuity actually payable to Executive&#146;s Beneficiary pursuant to any Other Company Plan, each determined as of the earliest date on which payments of Other Company Plan Benefits are payable to the Beneficiary.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>b.</font><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font size=2>In the event that the Executive dies after termination of employment with the Company and after his Supplemental Retirement Benefit has vested but prior to commencement of Supplemental Retirement Benefit payments under this Agreement, and has a Beneficiary on the date of his death, the Executive&#146;s Beneficiary shall receive, beginning with the first day of the month following the Executive&#146;s death and payable monthly, an annual amount equal to two-thirds of the Executive&#146;s Unreduced Supplemental Retirement Benefit offset by the amount of Other Company Plan Benefits; provided, however, that such offset shall be made at such time as Other Company Plan Benefits are payable (whether or not the Beneficiary has elected to defer payment to a later date) and in an amount
equal to the benefit that would have been payable to Executive&#146;s Beneficiary had Executive retired on the date of his death and commenced benefit payments in the form of a joint and two-thirds annuity on such date.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>7.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Death After Retirement</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>In the event of the Executive&#146;s death after commencement of the Executive&#146;s Supplemental Retirement Benefit, the Executive&#146;s Beneficiary shall receive, beginning with the first day of the month following the Executive&#146;s death and payable monthly, an annual amount equal to two-thirds of the Supplemental Retirement Benefit that was being paid to the Executive prior to the Executive&#146;s death.</font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>8.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Limitation on Spouse&#146;s Benefits</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>Payment of Supplemental Retirement Benefits to the Executive&#146;s Beneficiary under Sections 6 or 7 hereof shall terminate on the earlier of the date of death or remarriage of such Beneficiary.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>9.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Benefits Payable by Company</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>All benefits payable under this Agreement shall constitute an unfunded obligation of the Company.  Payments shall be made, as due, from the general funds of the Company.  The Company may, in its sole and absolute discretion, establish one or more accounts, funds or trusts to reflect its obligations under this Agreement and may make such investments as it may deem desirable to assist it in meeting such obligations.  Any assets held in such accounts, funds or trusts shall remain assets of the Company subject to claims of its creditors.  No person eligible for a benefit under this Agreement shall have any right, title or interest in any such assets.  This Agreement shall constitute solely an unsecured promise by the Company to pay supplemental retirement benefits to the extent provided herein.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>10.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Inalienability of Benefits</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>The right of any person to any benefit or payment under this Agreement shall not be subject to voluntary or involuntary transfer, alienation or assignment, and, to the fullest extent permitted by law, shall not be subject to attachment, execution, garnishment, sequestration or other legal or equitable process or be transferable by operation of law in the event of bankruptcy or insolvency of the Executive or any Beneficiary.  In the event a person who is receiving or is entitled to receive benefits under the Agreement attempts to assign, transfer or dispose of such right, or if an attempt is made to subject said right to such process, such assignment, transfer or disposition shall be null and void.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>11.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Forfeiture of Benefits</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>The Executive shall forfeit his Supplemental Retirement Benefit in the event of the Executive&#146;s conviction of a felony relating to the conduct of the business of the Company or willful unauthorized disclosure of a trade secret of the Company.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>12.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Payments to Minors and Incompetents</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>If the Executive or Beneficiary entitled to receive any benefits hereunder is a minor or is deemed by the Company or is adjudged to be legally incapable of giving valid receipt and discharge for such benefits, payment of benefits will be made to the duly appointed guardian or legal representative of such minor or incompetent or to such other legally appointed person as the Company may designate.  Such payment shall, to the extent made, be deemed a complete discharge of any liability for such payment under this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style='page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>13.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Withholding</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>The Company shall have the right to deduct from any payments due under this Agreement any taxes required to be withheld with respect to such payments.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Merger, Consolidation or Sale of Assets</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>In the event the Company shall, at any time, be merged or consolidated with or into any corporation or corporations, or in the event that all or substantially all of the assets of the Company shall be sold or otherwise transferred to another corporation, the provisions of this Agreement, including the provisions of this Section, shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the successor of the Company resulting from such merger, consolidation or sale of assets.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td width="8%" valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:12.0pt 0in 0in 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Governing Law</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>Except to the extent pre-empted by federal law, the provisions of this Agreement will be construed according to the laws of the State of Delaware (without giving effect to the provisions thereof relating to conflicts of law).</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:8.33%;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:5pt; margin-top:5pt;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>Consent of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:5pt; margin-top:5pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>We consent to the incorporation by reference in
Registration Statement Nos. 333-56194, 333-129083, 333-131522, 333-131523 and 333-62008 on Form S-8 of our report
dated April 19, 2007, relating to the consolidated financial statements of Pathmark Stores, Inc., and subsidiaries (the
&#147;Company&#148;), which expresses an unqualified opinion and includes an explanatory paragraph relating to the Company&#146;s
adoption of Statement of Financial Accounting Standards (&#147;SFAS&#148;) No. 123(R), &#147;Share-Based Payment&#148;, as revised,
and SFAS No. 158, &#147;Employers&#146; Accounting for Defined Benefit Pension and Other Postretirement Plans &#150; as amendment of
SFAS No. 87, 88, 106 and 132(R)&#148;, and our report dated April 19, 2007 relating to management's report on the effectiveness of
internal control over financial reporting, appearing in and incorporated by reference in the Annual Report on Form 10-K of Pathmark
Stores, Inc. for the fiscal year ended February 3, 2007.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:5pt; margin-top:5pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>/s/ Deloitte &amp; Touche LLP</font></p>

<TYPE>EX-31.1

<FILENAME>ex31-1.htm
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>Pathmark Stores, Inc. Form 10-K For the fiscal year ended February 3, 2007; Exhibit 31.1</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#ffffff" style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>




<p style=' margin-bottom:8pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><b><font size=2>Exhibit 31.1</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:12pt;text-align:center;line-height: 150%;'><b><font size=2>Form of CEO Certification</font></b></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td  colspan="4" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>I, John T. Standley, certify that:</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>1.</font></p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Pathmark Stores, Inc.;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>2.</font></p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>3.</font></p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, the financial statements and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>4.</font></p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>a.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>b.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>c.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>d.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting; and</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>5.</font></p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>a.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal controls over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>b.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >

        <td width="5%" valign=top >

        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Pathmark Stores, Inc.;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >

        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>3.</font></p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, the financial statements and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>4.</font></p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >

        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>a.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>b.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>

        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>d.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt'><font size=2>disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting; and</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>5.</font></p> </td>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>a.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal controls over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td width="2%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="5%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>b.</font></p> </td>
        <td width="84%" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6.0pt'><font size=2>any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="50%" style=' border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><i><font size=2>Date:  </font></i><font size=2>April 19, 2007</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>/s/ Frank G. Vitrano</font></b></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr style='height:2.0pt'>
        <td width="42%" valign=top style='border-bottom: solid black .5pt;height:2.0pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>

    <tr style='height:2.0pt'>
        <td width="42%" valign=top style='height:2.0pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>

    <tr>
        <td  colspan="2" valign=top >
